content: meet **seagull** one of the nine free **summer breeze amigurumi** characters taken straight away from my greek summers the pattern is easy to intermediate and takes no more than a couple of hours to make to make this cutie you ll practice * crocheting on the round double_crochet * working on the foundation chain * sewing pieces together follow me @aminationblog to join the fun share your makes on instagram using #aminationsummer
